name: Meg and the Trapper
description:
Meg and the Trapper is a fangame with a double tribute. First to the arcade games of the early 90's like Tumblepop (my favorite) or Snow Bros. And, especially, a tribute to Dead by Daylight reimagining it as a classic arcade.

The game has infinite randomly generated levels. Repairing four generators will open the exit door and the access to next level. Use the CTRL key to repair the generators and the SPACE bar to jump. Press F at any time to switch fullscreen on and off. Escape from the killer, as you only have two lives. And beware of the traps!

I made this game in my spare time and it may have some bugs here and there. If you have any issues, please leave a comment. Hope you like it!

Download installer or .ZIP file 

If  Windows Smartscreen prevents to run it, just click on More Options and Run Anyway
